Param.name: sampling_time
Param.Description: FRB search time resolution

Param.name: bandwidth
Param.Description: CHIME telescope bandwidth

Param.name: centre_frequency
Param.Description: CHIME telescope central frequency

Param.name: npol
Param.Description: The CHIME telescope has dual-polarization feeds

Param.name: bits_per_sample
Param.Description: CHIME/FRB samples 16384 frequency channels at 0.983 ms cadence as 8-bit integers

Param.name: tsys
Param.Description: CHIME receiver noise temperature

Param.name: backend
Param.Description: CHIME/FRB backend

Param.name: event_no
Param.Description: CHIME/FRB event number assigned by real-time pipeline

Param.name: known_source_name
Param.Description: CHIME/FRB internal known source name

Param.name: event_type
Param.Description: Unknown event type assigned from real-time pipeline e.g. EXTRAGALACTIC, AMBIGUOUS, GALACTIC

Param.name: pipeline_name
Param.Description: The name of the pipeline that produced this data

Param.name: dm
Param.Description: Dispersion measure from real-time pipeline

Param.name: dm_error
Param.Description: Error in dispersion measure from real-time pipeline

Param.name: timestamp_utc
Param.Description: Topocentric arrival time at 400 MHz

Param.name: timestamp_utc_error
Param.Description: Error in topocentric arrival time at 400 MHz in seconds from real-time pipeline

Param.name: snr
Param.Description: Signal-to-noise ratio from real-time pipeline

Param.name: pos_error_semiminor_deg_95
Param.Description: Localization error ellipse semi-minor axis to 95 percent C.L. in right ascension (J2000) in degrees from real-time pipeline

Param.name: pos_error_semimajor_deg_95
Param.Description: Localization error ellipse semi-major axis to 95 percent C.L. in declination (J2000) in degrees from real-time pipeline

Param.name: dm_gal_ne_2001_max
Param.Description: Max Milky Way DM contribution (NE 2001 model) from real-time pipeline

Param.name: dm_gal_ymw_2016_max
Param.Description: Max Milky Way DM contribution (YMW 2016 model) from real-time pipeline

Param.name: timestamp_utc_inf_freq
Param.Description: Topocentric arrival time at infinite frequency

Param.name: timestamp_utc_inf_freq_error
Param.Description: Error in topocentric arrival time at infinite frequency from real-time pipeline

Param.name: spectral_index
Param.Description: Spectral index as measured by real-time pipeline

Param.name: spectral_index_error
Param.Description: Error in spectral index as measured by real-time pipeline

ObservatoryLocation.id: CHIME lives at Dominion Radio Astrophysical Observatory (DRAO)

How.Description: Real-time pipeline topocentric time-of-arrival is corrected for dispersion to bottom of CHIME band (400 MHz)

Why.Description: CHIME/FRB VOEvent Service detection-type alert from real-time pipeline
Why.Concept: Importance is a machine learning score from 0-1 separating RFI (0) from an astrophysical signal (1); Probability is not reported for the detection-type VOEvent
